title: Topic 004 Question 062
body: You manage a database environment for a Microsoft Volume Licensing customer named Contoso, Ltd. Contoso uses License Mobility through Software
You need to deploy 50 databases. The solution must meet the following requirements:
✑ Minimize Microsoft SQL Server licensing costs.
What should you include in the solution? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
